title: First article ever
content: We are happy to welcome you in our new website! Feel free to read anything you find here (you won't find a lot though)

title: Dog ate my sandwich
content: My dog, which name is Kora, ate my sandwich without even asking me! It is awful because I had other plans on it

title: Another useless article
content: We are happy to announce that we will write more useless things on our website soon, so check our updates. That's totally true, author's wife can prove it:)
